entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
